metadata.name: Red Poet Scrolls #46
metadata.description: Step into the world of the legendary Red Poet, Renga the Red Ninja (#5963), with this collection of his timeless verse. Explore each scroll, crafted with masterful art and steeped in rich language and lore. Experience the power of the Red Poet's words and the tales they weave, immersing yourself in his captivating world.
